title: Meanwhile as Galio is getting his rework
body:
{{champion:83}} {{champion:19}} : It's time Galio.

{{champion:3}} : Welp... It's been a wild ride guys. I know we've been through a lot and yeah, there were some really tough times but I just wanted to let you guys know I wouldn't have had made it through without you guys. To me, we are brothers forever.

{{champion:82}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:6}} : No need for the touchy words my man, we feel you. Go... your rework awaits. 

*Back at Riot HQ*

{{champion:19}} : Halt, there's someone inside.

{{champion:83}} : What the... who's that?

{{champion:3}} : (What the.... what's going on?)

..............

{{champion:266}} : What do you mean it's not my time? Do you realise how long I, the Darkin Blade have waited for you impudent fools to rework this mess of a kit and bring me to my true glory?

{{champion:17}} : Listen here bub, we don't have time for you or your minor complaints. Do you see this list? Guess what? You're not on it. So get out of my face before I call security. 

{{champion:266}} : Y-you... you'll pay for this!

{{champion:17}} : GUARDS! 

{{champion:106}} {{champion:48}} : You called Sir?

{{champion:17}} : Take this fool outside and give him the *cough* *light rework*

{{champion:266}} : Wait! You can't do this! This is... INHUMANE!

{{champion:106}} {{champion:48}} : Let's go bub. You ain't walking this off.

{{champion:266}} : NOOOOO!

..............

{{champion:17}} : Finally! Now that that's taken care of... oh! You're here!

{{champion:19}} {{champion:83}} : We've brought him sir.

{{champion:17}} : Ah! Excellent work gentlemen. Now please, excuse us whilst me and our elusive guest have time to catch up.

{{champion:19}} {{champion:83}} : Of course sir.

{{champion:3}} : G-greetings sir, it's been awhile!

{{champion:17}} : Ah yes, Galio it certainly has been awhile. A lot has changed since you first seen entered this building. So much history... so much work. Now I presume you know why I called you here?

{{champion:3}} : S-sir! I've been informed that I was to receive my large scale VGU?

{{champion:17}} : So you've been informed... good, good! This makes it much easier. As you already know, here at Riot Games we strive to deliver the BEST experience to our players and patrons and to do this, sometimes we need to re-pave our own roads and re-build our own structures. You Galio, are the new face of grand rework project and are representing us on our latest and greatest champion rework. Here's the champion road map and skill set we've devised... what do you think son?

{{champion:3}} : It- It's beautiful...! I'm truly honored sir. These two skills especially! I don't think I've ever seen anyone with a double lined skill shot closing into the target location.... and THIS! The ability to fly high into the heavens and slam down with the force of mighty wings... how did you come up with this?!

{{champion:17}} : *Cough*... Why, we've designed them specifically for you son! Think about it, how many other handsome warriors can er... express their sheer amounts of uh... VOLUME that's right, volume through their ability to absolutely pulverise and smite their foes from the sky?

{{champion:3}} I... I don't know how to thank you sir! If there's anything you need I'll gladly-

{{champion:17}} : Shhh. Now, now child. It's okay. Here at Riot Games, we not only look out for the summoners but also our INVALUABLE assets, you champions. Now, I think I've bored you with my talking long enough. Please Galio, step into the rework machine.

{{champion:3}} : (Well... I guess this is it. This is my turning point. No longer will be I known as Galio the unpicked...  this time, I'll build my own legacy. Mordekaiser, Nunu, Urgot... I won't forget you guys! Let's meet again as reworked champions in the future!)

*Back at the undesirable lounge*

{{champion:266}} : Huff... huff. Damnit, I've been already been damaged to this extent?

{{champion:6}} : It's you.

{{champion:20}} : Pee-yooh, you look like you've been in a dumpster! Hehehe, get it Willump? *Hee hee hee, master you funny!*

{{champion:82}} : Scorch marks and black lashes... what exactly happened there Aatrox?

{{champion:266}} : You... you were right Morderkaiser. I never should have gone up there. I was *light reworked*.

{{champion:20}} {{champion:6}} : *GASP*

{{champion:82}} : You fool..! Did I not tell you this would happen?! *Sigh*... Now look what you've done. You've cut your own life short.

{{champion:266}} : I should have listened! 

{{champion:82}} : It's too late for that now. You can only bask in the company of misery like the rest of us broken men.

{{champion:6}} : Don't worry Aatrox, they'll fix you up soon... right?

{{champion:20}} : Yeah cheer up pal! You've still got us... and Willump! *HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA*

{{champion:266}} : Oh god... NO PLEASE! MAKE IT STOP!

*HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA HA*

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0vhfEgQVDAc

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Fin.

P.S: Where am I even meant to post this garbage?

replies.body:
*Meanwhile, in pro play purgatory*
{{champion:429}} So, have we figured out where the exit is yet? 
{{champion:203}} Lamb: It does not seem that way.
{{champion:203}} Wolf: WE'RE ALL DOOMED!
{{champion:98}} Well, let's look again.
{{champion:429}} You're quite optimistic.
{{champion:98}} No. I just grow tired of entertaining Azir's whims.
{{champion:268}} LOOK! THIS SAND CASTLE HAS A DRAWBRIDGE AND EVERYTHING!

Riot keeps catching him and putting him back there with the nerf net.

> Riot keeps catching him and putting him back there with the nerf net.

That's impossible, Shen learned the secret art of dodging at last second through the teaching of our beloved Rfit Scuttler and molded this art into his taunt - otherwise how would they have the exact same animation for their dashes? -
Like the Rift Scuttler, Riot has created a weakness for Shen: The Honeyfruit.

> [{quoted}](name=Melledoneus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=KaHjuMd0,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2017-03-09T16:11:51.148+0000)

this part is gold lmao. i just imagine Azir going stir crazy and building sand castles to try and relive his former glory. both as an emperor of Shurima, and as a competitive pick. XD (that's actually pretty dark...)
Shouldn't {{champion:421}} be there too?
She's too busy enjoying destroying Azir's castles to worry about the white void they are in.

Aatrox much XD Well done sir

Don't worry, there is a line under the rework contract.

oh my god. I knew it.

why am I reading it a second time

halp
Why am I listening to the full hour of bot Nunu laughing???
I like this kind of story always make me smile :).
I love how Teemo is Riot. lulz

Meanwhile, in Outdated Purgatory...
{{champion:31}} That stone brute gets a rework? My word, has Master Teemo not seen my outdated model and clunky kit? I should have a word with this fellow, but I fear I might soil my britches in the process. I suppose I will settle for this slight rework on my Devour, pip pip, cheerio, toad in the hole.

{{champion:36}} Mundo really wish they'd update monster man's funny hat skin, so it didn't sound like Mundo bowl movement or look like one. Mundo also need new coat of paint, Mundo's cleaver arm feel rusty.

{{champion:9}} Fools! I barelly even have a place on the rift anymore! No one fears me like they should! I demand retribution for my long wait!

{{champion:54}} Rock, Pebble, Stone, Boulder...AVALANCHE.

{{champion:33}} Okay, Yeah, Alright, Sure, Yeah, Okay, Sure.

{{champion:27}} Highly ill advised, Fiddle; prefer they take their time with your rebirth or else you'll end up like Shen: new, shiny, same voice over. I personally only desire a visual tune-up, given how outdated my current form is.

{{champion:45}} I swear, they only have a _short_ attention span when it comes to my current state! Only _little_ changes and _small_ fixes, yet my model looks like a **huge** piece of CRAP!

{{champion:26}} In due time, in the meanwhile, they'll just keep releasing skins for us that look visually pleasing until they move demonstrating their bad animations, assuming they did't add a few new animations for a Summoner's dollar.

The ability to fly high into the heavens and slam down with the force of mighty wings... how did you come up with this?!

What a lovely story. Eagerly awaiting Urgot, Nunu, and Mordekaiser's reworks.
This gave me a few giggles for sure. And knowing how shit most memes are on the boards that's quite the achievement

Why do I get the feeling that Galios "up in the air and slam" was meant for someone else. 
Well played, well played sir!
Because of the Light rework, Aatrox will be considered "recently updated" and will not get a full GU i think. The Diver update will mostly be numbers adjustment. :v
They said that this is just to hold him over for his rework during the diver update.
I'm just going to miss his heal :(

https://gfycat.com/SlimUnnaturalChupacabra

Teemo is on the left, Aatrox is on the right
Morde is fine
no he is not, multiple unhealthy mechanic's that are more broken then riven's sword.

Than**

Riot needs to tackle other projects before looking at Morde again.
THEN WHY THE FUCK DID THEY EVEN TOUCH HIM!? AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA

Because all of his "mains" begged for a rework and then complained instead of learning how to play him. I get the frustration. I played morde in s3 and s4 and enjoyed him quite a bit. He should have been what yorick is, in my opinion. But, he doesn't need to constantly be reworked now and take priority over other champions who have been waiting just as long. 

To be honest, Morde should be removed from the game completely and re-released later. Much later. But, his "fans" aren't patient.

> [{quoted}](name=mikemcparty,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=KaHjuMd0,comment-id=00150000000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-24T16:56:18.165+0000)
>
> Because all of his "mains" begged for a rework and then complained instead of learning how to play him. I get the frustration. I played morde in s3 and s4 and enjoyed him quite a bit. He should have been what yorick is, in my opinion. But, he doesn't need to constantly be reworked now and take priority over other champions who have been waiting just as long. 
> 
> To be honest, Morde should be removed from the game completely and re-released later. Much later. But, his "fans" aren't patient.

Actually, no main ever wanted a Mordekaiser rework. There is nothing to learn about him now. He has no optimal item paths, his kit is clunky and poorly thought for a toplaner (since he IS a toplaner, just look at his playrate). He can't ult when he has drake. The drake still is bugged and isn't easy to access when you're toplane unless you burn tp. Why can't he get a herald ghost? Why does he still have his exp sharing? WHY ALL THE THINGS? And most of all, how can you say things like "To be honest, Morde should be removed from the game completely and re-released later. "?? Imagine if Urgot, Warwick, Eve and the likes where removed. This is plain dumb. He shouldn't be removed. He just should have been reworked. Which he wasn't. He was gutted.
WTF man.

Riot can't make everyone happy and clearly you weren't aware of all the "rework morde" posts. They were just as prevalent as the ones we see about urgot and Yorick. 

Riot tried something unique and it didn't work. They are not going to revert the kit changes and have made that clear. 

If people are that unhappy with the current state of the champion, don't want to play him, and are unwilling to wait for a rework, then he should be removed for the meantime until he can be rereleased as a champions that his "mains" will be happy with.

> [{quoted}](name=mikemcparty,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=KaHjuMd0,comment-id=0015000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-28T21:39:37.852+0000)
>
> Riot can't make everyone happy and clearly you weren't aware of all the "rework morde" posts. They were just as prevalent as the ones we see about urgot and Yorick. 
> 
> Riot tried something unique and it didn't work. They are not going to revert the kit changes and have made that clear. 
> 
> If people are that unhappy with the current state of the champion, don't want to play him, and are unwilling to wait for a rework, then he should be removed for the meantime until he can be rereleased as a champions that his "mains" will be happy with.

There weren't many "rework morde" and most of them weren't from Mordekaiser players.  
You're basically saying it's shit but it's fine... I almost think you're trying to bait?
